topics.body:
So Squiggy, I just wanted to say things.
[spoiler]I love you. You are such a wonderful, fun, kind person. You make me feel good about myself, and just happy around you, you give me confidence. I really want to meet you in person, so that I could get a chance to just hold you close to me, at the very least. I'm honestly really nervous typing this out, but I felt I should say something to you today. Squiggy, will you be my Valentine?[/spoiler]
